about_the_game:
Fate of Aruna is a work in progress in early development. Currently none of the planned RPG mechanics are implemented. Much of what is implemented is incomplete. The following section describes the idea and direction we would like to go with our future development. TRAFFICJAM LLC has the following to say about our game:

The idea of Fate of Aruna is to create a Fantasy Role Playing game that should allow the player to take part is historic events which affect the world of Aruna, within a narrative that spans generations. The player should be able to uncover the larger story through use of an archeology skill which gives a glimpse into the ancient past. Our plan for Fate of Aruna includes a Lore-heavy game design which includes a highly sophisticated Runic language inspired by the Ultima series. The puzzles and dialog interactions should reward players who take the time to read and understand the history of Aruna and its mysterious past.

What is the world of Aruna?

Aruna is a high fantasy and science fiction setting that takes place amid the ruins of a shattered planet. Many thousands of years ago the planet of Aruna was sundered in an apocolypse known as The Curse. As developers we drew heavily on inspiration from Steven Errikson Gardens of the Moon series, as well as ancient Summarian and Babylonian mythos. Episode 1 of our story takes place in media res and is till heavily in development.

Planned Gameplay Elements

*Disclaimer: The following features are not complete in the current build and may not make it into the final version of Fate of Aruna Episode 1. Furthermore the developers can make no promise that any of these features will be implemented. Purchase of Fate of Aruna should be on the basis of the game in its current state.*

Expansive plot spanning many thousand years.

Unique Semantic Puzzles that require understanding of Runic language to solve

Action-oriented combat with many devastating spells and abilities

Class and Racial progression in line with classic RPGs]

Current Gameplay Elements

Map Exploration

Fast-Paced Combat

10+ Quests

15+ NPCs across 4 detailed game maps

We do hope you join us on this Early Access journey.

**OUR STORE PAGE TEXT IS 100% OUR OWN OPINIONS AND OWN WRITING. NO AI WAS USED TO GENERATE THIS TEXT**

content_descriptors.notes: The game's depiction of violence is largely cartoon themed, with some sprite-based blood but nothing graphic. Although some characters or outfits in the game may be revealing there is no explicit sexual content.

name: Fate Of Aruna

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • VR Support: not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Alcohol Reference
Use of Tobacco

Suggestive Themes

short_description: A science fiction and high fantsy role playing game which takes place amid the ruins of a shattered planet.
